text.section: A person who has received a notice under § 8-401 of this subtitle and has appealed the value or classification under § 8-404 of this subtitle shall be notified by the supervisor of the date and time of the hearing.

If a person notified under subsection (a) of this section requests, the supervisor shall offer alternate dates and times for hearings. To the extent possible, these dates and times shall:
reflect a mutually convenient hearing schedule; and
provide for some Saturday and evening hearings as required.
The supervisor may provide group hearings for blocks or communities if the real property is similar or has similar characteristics.
